description: This file defines a Flutter widget called HomeScreen, which serves as the main screen for the app. It displays a greeting to the user, offers navigation tiles to different parts of the app, and includes a logout button. The widget relies on the provider package for state management and interacts with app routing and authentication state.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the main screen with navigation and user greeting.

methods.name: _logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user and navigates to the login screen.

methods.name: _navTile
methods.description: Builds a navigation tile with an icon, title, and route.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomeScreen, including app bar, greeting, and navigation options.
